item.description: Update FATALITY Structure Fire; INC#0511; 01:54PM; 2617 W Crestmoore Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3b2IZE2; Glassell Park; Despite a quick knockdown of the fully involved home, one fatality in the home is confirmed. No further details available on the victim. LA County Coroner will be the point agency on identification and cause of death. LAFD Arson and Counter-Terrorism Section is conducting a cause investigation. No other injuries reported. No further details.; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0511; 10:21AM; 2617 W Crestmoore Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3b2IZE2; Glassell Park; KNOCKDOWN: 35 firefighters extinguished the fire in 21 minutes. Crews prevented the fire from extending into the exposed vegetation which would have put additional residences at risk. There appears to be three buildings on the property. One was fully involved in fire upon LAFD arrival and a 2nd building has some fire damage. Firefighters are investigating unconfirmed reports of possible victim(s) inside the building. No further details.; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC14 BC2 E201 E250 E42 E44 E55 E56 EM9 RA55 RA56 RA850 T1 T50; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0511; 09:50AM; 2603 W Crestmoore Pl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Q7seGL; Glassell Park; Two story, single family dwelling fully involved in fire with vegetation exposed on two sides of the building. Firefighters are in the defensive mode. ; FS 50; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 1; BC11 BC14 BC2 E250 E44 E55 E56 RA55 RA850 T50 EM9 RA56; CH7; 15; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0453; 09:23AM; 1112 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cvsocd; Downtown; KNOCKDOWN: 81 firefighters extinguished the fire in 22 minutes. Building type updated to an approximately 100' x 50' commercial building with four distinct occupancies under one common attic. The initial fire attack quickly extinguished the contents fire on the first floor and continued up the mezzanine and into the attic to extinguish any extension of the fire. The adjacent, exposed buildings were defended from any damage. There are no injuries reported. Cause and $ loss TBD. No further details.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM20 CM22 E10 E11 E202 E203 E209 E210 E215 E26 E3 E4 E9 EA1 EM13 HR3 RA10 RA3 RA803 RA810 SQ21 T10 T15 T2 T3 T9 UR3; CH7; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Body Recovery; INC#0440; 08:52AM; 2899 E Observatory Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3PR0jus; Griffith Park; LA City Park Rangers reported locating a deceased person in heavy brush. LAFD resources confirmed death and will assist with body recovery as needed by LA County Coroner and law enforcement. All questions regarding patient identity and circumstances of death are referred to those agencies. LAPD Inc# 1245 No further details.; FS 35; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; E220 T20; CH4; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0453; 09:01AM; 1112 S Main St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cvsocd; Downtown; One story commercial building with heavy smoke showing. Two additional task forces requested. There is at least one additional occupancy exposed (connected?). Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E10 E209 E210 E4 E9 RA10 RA810 SQ21 T10 T9; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Update Traffic; INC#0354; 07:56AM; 20312 W Willoughby Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3op8F0B; Chatsworth; Firefighters extricated and transported the patient (unknown condition). Due to the incident occurring on a worksite, OSHA was notified of the injury. LAPD Inc# 0925 No further details.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E287 E288 E8 E88 RA107 RA88 T87 T88 UR88; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

Traffic; INC#0354; 07:25AM; 20312 W Willoughby Ln; MAP: https://bit.ly/3op8F0B; Chatsworth; A bobcat rolled down approximately 15-20 foot embankment with driver inside. Condition of the patient is unknown at this time. Urban Search and Rescue rig added to the response. Firefighters are evaluating the situation to best determine how to safely bring the patient up to ground level for treatment/transport as needed.; FS 28; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E287 E288 E8 E88 RA107 RA88 T87 UR88; CH8; 18; Margaret Stewart

Update KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1142; 03:57PM; 3767 S Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lrK74E; Exposition Park; KNOCKDOWN: 26 firefighters extinguished the fire in 14 minutes with no injuries reported. The firefighter's quick work contained the fire to contents of the building and prevented spread into the framing of the structure. The building type is updated to a commercial building (as opposed to strip mall) that appears to be vacant. No further details.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E215 E226 E26 E34 RA66 SQ21 T15 T26; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1142; 03:43PM; 3767 S Normandie Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lrK74E; Exposition Park; One story strip mall with moderate smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 15; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC13 E15 E215 E226 E26 E34 T15 T26; CH7; 13; Margaret Stewart
